textBeforeTable: Unit Types NYATI ELAN We take immense pleasure to inform you that, we are Launching a new project "Nyati ELAN", located at Wagholi, Pune. With close proximity to schools and colleges like Lexicon International School and JSPM college of Engineering, Hospitals like Columbia Asia Hospital, makes the location ideal for a project of this caliber. Nyati Elan, is a 40 acre property, divided into 5 phases, which caters to all age groups, starting from children play areas to multi purpose sports courts, well equiped gymnasiums, three swimming pools, and various other state of the art amenities. At Nyati Group, we are strong on eco-friendliness, so all our flats come with solar water heater systems. There will be a dedicated space for vermiculture and bio- sanitizer pits. We offer you piped gas within your flats and a 24 hour power backup to all common areas, lifts and 5 Ampere points within each flats (lights, fans, TVs, etc).
